mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SONARSERVICE.SONARQUBE(sonarqube_name, sonarqube_key, maven_files_id) VALUES(#{sonarqubeName}, #{sonarqubeKey}, #{mavenFileId})
mapper.select: SELECT A.project_name, B.id, B.sonarqube_key FROM SONARSERVICE.MAVEN_FILES A INNER JOIN SONARSERVICE.SONARQUBE B ON A.id = B.maven_files_id where A.user_id = #{userUid}
